dict.string: This app uses speech recognition to understand your voice commands for offline assistant functionality.
This app needs microphone access to listen to your voice commands.
This app needs calendar access to create and manage events for you.
This app needs reminders access to create and manage reminders for you.
This app needs contacts access to help you message or call people.
This app can open the camera when you ask.
This app can save photos when you take pictures via voice commands.
This app uses your location to provide weather information.
